Qieyun: 以開三仙平?, 以開三仙去?
English: to drag out; to protract. to invite

Qieyun: 幫三A眞平?, 幫三A眞去?
English: to set in order; to entertain
the person entertaining the guests; the master of the ceremonies

Qieyun: 來開三侵平?, 來開三侵去?
English: to approach; near; on the point of
name of a river in Shantung.
name of the locality where the capital of the Ch'i State, 營丘 Ying-chiu, was situated. Now that place is called 臨淄縣
the gate of a village; a village of 25 families

Qieyun: 匣開一寒平?, 見開一寒平?, 匣開一寒去?

English: shoulder to shoulder; heel to heel; to be close to each other
unlike; degenerate; worthless (a term used by a son of himself when writing to his father)
